properties.name: io.service84.library.standardauth.jwtaf.url
properties.description: The URL for the provider public keys. If a hostname is provided the well-known jwks path will be appended and https:// will be prepended

properties.name: io.service84.library.standardauth.jwtaf.authority
properties.description: An optional authority/scope/permission to give to every subject authenticated with the provider

properties.name: io.service84.library.standardauth.jwtaf.defaultPublicKeyTTL
properties.description: The time to cache the public keys from the provider. Default 86400s

properties.name: io.service84.library.standardauth.jwtaf.minSecondsRemaining
properties.description: Refresh the public keys if there is less than minSecondsRemaining. Default 6s
